name: api-testing-framework
description: Modern advanced REST API testing framework with Postman - featuring performance testing, security checks, contract validation, and multi-API support
author: Rudra

scripts.test: newman run "JSON Placeholder.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,html
scripts.test:json-placeholder: newman run "JSON Placeholder.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export results/json-placeholder-results.json || true
scripts.test:performance: newman run "JSON Placeholder.postman_collection.json" -e "Performance-Testing.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export results/performance-results.json || true
scripts.test:workflows: newman run "JSON Placeholder.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --folder "Workflow Tests" --reporters cli,html || true
scripts.report: newman run "JSON Placeholder.postman_collection.json" -e "JSON Placeholder Env.postman_environment.json" --reporters cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export results/api-test-report.html
